UPDATE BLACKLIST SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE BL_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT FILE_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , UPDATE_NAME , FILE_PATH FROM IMAGE WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND BOARD_TYPE = 3
SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM BLACKLIST WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

UPDATE BLACKLIST SET BL_TITLE = ? , BL_CONTENT = ? , BLACK_ID = ? WHERE BL_NO = ?
